description.html: Bards of the College of Resonance are rarely found alone, but are usually working as a group to enhance the arts of other bards or each other. Whether being the background musicians for someone else’s performance or the effects department for a stage play, these diligent assistants rarely take the spotlight, but the heights achieved by entertainers would not be so nearly as lofty without their support crews.
When you join the College of Resonance at 3rd level, you gain proficiency in jeweler’s tools and the glass harp.
Also at 3rd level, whenever a creature rolls a Bardic Inspiration die, any creatures that also have a Bardic Inspiration die can use their reaction to lock their Bardic Inspiration die to that value.

description.html: Starting at 6th level, whenever you roll an attack with advantage, if both rolls would hit, your next attack against the same creature has advantage.

description.html: Beginning at 14th level, whenever an ally rolls one of your Bardic Inspiration dice, you add that to your next spell or weapon attack roll. If multiple allies roll before your next spell or weapon attack roll, you take the highest value.
